description: Louis is a really cute and nice guy, but we wanted to know something that he wouldn’t necessarily tell anybody else, so we asked him about the most random place he’s ever had sex at. “The backseat of my friend’s car, while he was driving.” To which he added, “He had no idea...” We figured playing with his dick on camera wouldn’t be too crazy, so he jerked off until he blew every last drop of his loads.
title: Louis
